results.content:
The good: Tutor is has a nice energy and is knowledgable. And it's a nice change to see someone  thinking and tutoring 'on their feet'. 
What could be better: some code feels a bit improvised and hard-coded. It could have paid off to do a little more thinking in advance.
results.content_html:
The good: Tutor is has a nice energy and is knowledgable. And it's a nice change to see someone thinking and tutoring 'on their feet'.
What could be better: some code feels a bit improvised and hard-coded. It could have paid off to do a little more thinking in advance.

results.content: Everything has been well explained with plenty of practical demos to back it up
results.content_html: Everything has been well explained with plenty of practical demos to back it up

results.content:
Overall it's great course that I can definitely recommend.
It's easy to follow and very understandable. The quality of audio/video is great and the lecturer seems nice.

I was even able to modify certain things during the lessons by myself and by doing so, I solved some things that later occured and were addressed in the debug lessons :D

The only reason why I give this course 4,5/5 and not full 5 stars is, that I would love, if this course had like 2-3 hours more with certain subjects being explained more deeply.
By this I dont mean, that the things are not explained properly, they are, but there is certainly more to it. 
So I'm looking forward to more courses with this guy.
